definition: whatever you like/to do as one pleases
surname Cong

sentences.english: I believe that living to 90 gives one the right to do as they please.
sentences.chinese: 我相信一个人活到90岁，应该能够从心所欲了。

sentences.english: I am free in my life and in my work.
sentences.chinese: 无论对于生活还是工作，我都自由自在，从心所欲。
